sn46.10:4.1: “Mendicants, these seven awakening factors don’t arise to be developed and cultivated apart from the Holy One’s training.
sn46.10:4.3: The awakening-factors of mindfulness, investigation of principles, energy, rapture, tranquility, samādhi, and equanimity.
sn46.10:4.5: These seven awakening factors don’t arise to be developed and cultivated apart from the Holy One’s training.”
